# Frequently Asked Questions

## General

### What is PayBru?
PayBru is a membership and subscription platform designed for creators, organizations, and communities in South Africa. We help you build sustainable revenue through tiered memberships and community engagement tools.

### Who is PayBru for?
- **Content Creators** - YouTubers, streamers, podcasters
- **Community Leaders** - Discord servers, fan clubs, organizations
- **Businesses** - Membership-based services, clubs, associations

## For Creators

### How do I get started?
Contact us at hello@paybru.co.za or visit [paybru.co.za](https://paybru.co.za) to set up your community.

### What are the fees?
Contact our team for current pricing. We offer competitive rates with transparent fee structures.

### How do payouts work?
Creators receive scheduled payouts with full transparency on fees and earnings. View everything in your Creator Dashboard.

### Can I have multiple communities?
Yes! PayBru supports multi-community management from a single account.

## For Members

### What payment methods are supported?
We support secure payment processing through industry-standard payment gateways.

### Can I cancel my subscription?
Yes, you can manage your subscriptions anytime from your dashboard.

### Is my payment information secure?
Absolutely. We use enterprise-grade encryption and adhere to PCI DSS standards.

## Technical

### What technologies power PayBru?
- **.NET 9.0** - Latest Microsoft framework
- **Blazor** - Modern web UI framework
- **SQL Server** - Enterprise database
- **Secure Payment Processing** - Industry-standard integration

### Is PayBru GDPR compliant?
Yes, we take privacy seriously and comply with GDPR requirements.
